meanings.definition: A recording of a radio or television broadcast for review or evaluation.
meanings.sent1: I listened to the airchecks of the radio show to see how it sounded.
meanings.sent2: The station manager requested the airchecks of yesterday's broadcast.
meanings.sent3: The airchecks of the TV program were so funny, I couldn't stop laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of airchecks was like a time capsule of broadcasting history.
meanings.sent5: The quality of the airchecks was crystal clear, capturing every detail.

meanings.definition: To record a radio or television broadcast for review or evaluation.
meanings.sent1: We need to airchecks the show to make sure it meets the standards.
meanings.sent2: He airchecks every episode to improve his hosting skills.
meanings.sent3: She airchecks the news segment with such precision, it's impressive.
meanings.sent4: Airchecking the program is essential for identifying areas of improvement.
meanings.sent5: The team will airchecks the broadcast to analyze audience feedback.
